components.name: Amazon OpenSearch
components.description: Service used for retrieving search results based on user queries.

components.name: Amazon Kinesis Data Streams
components.description: Streams search query logs for real-time processing.

components.name: AWS Lambda
components.description: Serverless compute service that processes logs and invokes machine learning models.

components.name: Amazon S3
components.description: Storage service for raw logs and processed data.

components.name: Amazon DynamoDB
components.description: NoSQL database that stores the output of trending queries for quick retrieval.

data_flows.description: User search queries are sent to Amazon OpenSearch for result retrieval.
Search query logs are streamed for real-time processing.
Consolidated search query logs are stored in Amazon S3.
AWS Lambda processes logs stored in S3 for further analysis.
Processed trending queries are stored in DynamoDB for quick retrieval.

trust_boundaries.name: User Data Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary that separates user data from processing and storage components.

trust_boundaries.name: Data Processing Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary that encompasses data processing components and storage.
